body.p: You walk toward the OUT door. It slides open, and this time you force yourself to step through. Immediately, the door slides shut behind you. For a few moments, the new room is dark, and then the lights snap on.

This room is similar to the first. There’s the door you came through and another door on the opposite wall. On a third wall are three cubbyholes indented into the wall, with a large black word printed over them: SUPPLIES.
You look closer and see that each cubbyhole has something inside. The first has a bag of sand. The second has a large diamond. The third has a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.

div.data-value: Take the peanut butter and jelly sandwich
